trans-unit.source: Can be optionally applied to a workflow assembly.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, pode ser aplicado a um assembly de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It defines a mapping between a common language runtime namespace that is defined in the current assembly and an XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: Define um mapeamento entre um namespace de Common Language Runtime que é definido no assembly atual e um namespace de XML.

trans-unit.source: This information is used in extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization/deserialization when activities or workflows that are defined in the assembly decorated with this attribute are used.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações são usadas na serialização/desserialização do XAML (Extensible Application Markup Language) quando atividades ou fluxos de trabalho definidos no assembly decorado com esse atributo são usados.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the value for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o valor de <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the value for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o valor de <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute" /> class, initializing <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace" /> and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute" />, inicializando as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace" /> e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="clrNamespace" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="clrNamespace" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> name of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> da classe decorada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> name of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> nome da classe decorada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome do namespace do CLR da classe decorada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome do namespace da classe decorada CLR.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome do namespace de XML da classe decorada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome do namespace XML da classe decorada.
